history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />. You are speaking to the ORANGE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER driving directions
TTS <speak> No problem. <break strength='strong' /> I will give you driving directions to your destination. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you want to go?
USER we are for
TTS Let me know when you're ready to continue.
USER I'm writing.
TTS Where are you going?
USER the airport
TTS Okay, going to pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where would you like to leave from?
USER the waterfont
TTS Okay, leaving from the waterfront. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you want to travel
USER bouquet
TTS Okay, going to n bouquet st. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you want to travel
USER right now
TTS Okay, travelling at 02:21 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER Yes.

TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> I will pause after every step and give you time to write things down. <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 3 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 17 minutes.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Head southeast toward Amity St. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER Love you.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn right toward Amity St. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Take your time to write down the step <break strength='weak' /> and let me know when you are finished. </speak>
